channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google rolls out Android 16 to Pixel phones, unveils AI-powered edit suggestion for Google Photos
item.description: Google is releasing Android 16 to Pixel phones and rolling out additional updates to other Pixel devices.

item.title: The Top New Features in Apple WatchOS 26
item.description: Apple’s new additions this year include a wrist-flick gesture to dismiss a call and a personalized Workout Buddy to tell you when you “crushed it.”

item.title: A Google Shareholder is Suing the Company Over the TikTok Ban
item.description: Silicon Valley software engineer Tony Tan says his battle against Google and the Trump administration is about upholding the rule of law.

item.title: Airlines Don’t Want You to Know They Sold Your Flight Data to DHS
item.description: A contract obtained by 404 Media shows that an airline-owned data broker forbids the feds from revealing it sold them detailed passenger data.

item.title: Threads is finally getting a DM inbox
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg said today that Meta's social network Threads is finally testing a separate DM inbox that is separate from your Instagram DM Inbox.

item.title: The Top New Android 16 Features (2025): How to Install, Features, Release Date
item.description: Android 16 is now available for select phones today. Here are the features we're most excited about.

item.title: The ‘Long-Term Danger’ of Trump Sending Troops to the LA Protests
item.description: President Trump’s deployment of more than 700 Marines to Los Angeles—following ICE raids and mass protests—has ignited a fierce national debate over s...

item.title: Snap plans to sell lightweight, consumer AR glasses in 2026
item.description: Snap is back with a new pair of AR smart glasses, and for the first time in years, it’s ready to sell them to consumers. The company plans to sell the...

item.title: What makes TechCrunch All Stage different from other startup events? Answers to your most pressing questions
item.description: Tech and startup events have a formula. You know it. We know it. We’ve all done it. But TechCrunch All Stage 2025, which we’re hosting July 15 at the ...

item.title: Final call: Apply to host a Side Event at TechCrunch All Stage 2025 today
item.description: Hosting a Side Event around TechCrunch All Stage 2025 in Boston? Today is your last chance to get on the official calendar — and it’s not just for the...
